summary: My old character Irina now a follower for everyone
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone :)
This is my very old 1st character Irina, now as a follower for everyone :)
She is a Nord female, player leveled (she starts from level 15 and her maximum level is 90) 1 handed warrior and she is set to essential...so she won\'t die. She\'s also marriageable :)
She is warrior so she is wearing an Ebony Armor (not th armor you see in the screenies because i use a replacer) and a ebony 1H sword. in her inventory she have also a torch to help you in the night.

[b]She is located in Dragonbridge at Four Shiel Tavern[/b], look around there and you will find this sexy blonde beauty sitting at a table drinking or eating :)

----------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

put the .esp file, the textures folder and meshes folder inside your skyrim data folder
(ex: c:\\\\program Files (x86)\\Steam\\Steamapps\\Common\\Skyrim\\Data )

----------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]REQUIRED FILES:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]RACCOMENDED FILES:[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Navetsea\'s Body & Face Textures[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22701]Seductive Lips[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE - Caliente Female Body[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------

thanks everyone
Enjoy :)
author: TomAraya
